ext_description.p: A Font_definition is the definition of a font. Font support shall include outlines using glyphs, as well as font and font family.
ext_description.note: This description is intended to be a complete reference to a font definition. Items to be included are usually font size, aspect ratio, type, etc.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Registered_font is a font that is registered by an organization and defined within a document. Support shall be provided for font character representation using outline glyphs and font family exchange.
specifies the string for the identifier of the Registered_font. The font_code shall be an entry in the registration_document.
specifies the that contains the information about the Registered_font.
The combination of the font_code and the registration_document shall be unique within all members of a population of Registered_font.

ext_description.p: A Styled_text is a type of that is formatted text that appears in the material in a . The text shall be styled by font. The definition specifies font styling that shall be applied to realized characters. Externally defined text font and font family are supported.
ext_description.note: This part of ISO 10303 does not standardize the display of text on computer systems.
